abilities.name: Negative Hollows
abilities.description: Creates ghost-like hollows that pass through targets and drain their willpower, making them extremely negative and self-deprecating.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Sea-Prism Stone

reveals.information: The Hollow-Hollow Fruit's Negative Hollows can cause opponents to destroy their own equipment in self-loathing

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: Allows the user to make themselves and others completely invisible, perfect for stealth and sabotage operations.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Sea-Prism Stone

reveals.information: The Clear-Clear Fruit can be used to make entire groups invisible for coordinated sabotage
